I have a workaround for problems with shutting down, using grub.
add a stanza to /boot/grub/menu.lst with 'title Shutdown' and 'halt'
then you can shutdown with 'yes | grub-reboot 5' (replace 5 with the appropriate number for your shutdown stanza).
